markdownRemark.excerpt: A place to sway,    A place to say hurray    A place we run,    It is a lot of fun    It is the school,    We like all day,    Where we study and play
markdownRemark.html:
A place to **play**,

A place to sway,

A place to say hurray

 

When work is **done**,

A place we run,

It is a lot of fun

 

It is the school,

We like all day,

Where we study and play

 

Because of **this**, **Pandemic**, I miss my school **Today**
